alert.note: Alert for Fairfield; Kershaw; Lee; Lexington; Newberry; Richland; Saluda; Southern Lancaster (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 05 at 10:30PM EDT by NWS Columbia
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Fairfield, southwestern Lancaster, west central Lee, Newberry, northwestern Lexington, central Saluda, northwestern Richland and Kershaw Counties through 1115 PM EDT... At 1029 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Kershaw to near Newberry County Airport. Movement was south at 25 mph. ...Boaters on Lake Murray Should Seek Safe Harbor... HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Columbia, Irmo, Newberry, Camden, Winnsboro, VC Summer Nuclear Station, Highway 6 at Lake Murray Dam, Lake Wateree Dam, St. Andrews, Dentsville, Saluda, Prosperity, Lugoff, Columbia International University, Jenkinsville, Liberty Hill, Harbison State Forest, Lake Carolina, Monticello and Dreher Island State Park. This includes the following highways... Interstate 20 in South Carolina between mile markers 69 and 71, and between mile markers 82 and 111. Interstate 26 between mile markers 63 and 106. Interstate 77 between mile markers 18 and 47. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Fairfield; Kershaw; Lee; Lexington; Newberry; Richland; Saluda; Southern Lancaster
